backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with shipment, invoice, client, payment, account, and session models plus storage, authorization mixin, API keys, rate limiting, admin auth, and persistent login history state.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that adds an empty loginHistory map when upgrading from the old actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing frontend login‑history UI additions and React Query wiring, including affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and styling configuration.
frontend/.env: Stores the Google Maps API key for frontend usage.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and an OKLCH‑based color system with light and dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling admin/client authentication, client portal routing, shipment tracking, and hero/contact forms.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Admin client‑detail view showing company info and tabbed shipments/invoices using child table components.
Form for creating or updating a client profile using a Principal ID, including validation and submission via admin API mutations.
Dialog workflow for provisioning a new client account with email/mobile login and a generated temporary password.
Displays a searchable table of all clients and allows selecting a client for detailed view.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard organizing client management, tracking, revenue, login history, and configuration panels with authentication gating.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGoogl: Panel for viewing configuration status and saving or updating the Google Geocoding API key.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Button that exports all invoices to a CSV file via an admin export mutation.
Displays a client’s invoices with options to add new ones, generate PDFs, and send WhatsApp reminders.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Shows client login history with loading, error states, and a sortable table of login entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: Manages MSG91 API key storage and verifies access tokens with detailed success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReven: Fetches revenue data and renders a line chart with total revenue and loading/error fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Static panel indicating that role management is disabled under password-only authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Displays a client’s shipments and allows creating new shipments through a dialog form.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Google Maps panel for admins that loads the map script, initializes a styled map, and renders shipment markers with coordinate validation.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a detailed error UI with options to refresh or copy error info.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with an icon and description for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated admin bootstrap card showing a notice that Internet Identity-based admin setup is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Password-based admin login form handling authentication, loading state, and error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Logout button for admins that triggers logout and scrolls the page to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login component that returns null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog with a form for company info, retained for compatibility.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard showing shipments and invoices with logout and WhatsApp support actions.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Displays a client's invoice list with status badges and actions like PDF download and payment.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: UI card for clients to change temporary passwords with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Tab-based auth component switching between login and signup forms for clients.
Client login card supporting password login and OTP-based login with validation and mutations.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Displays active and delivered client shipments using fetched account status and shipment data.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: Signup form for new clients with validation, signup mutation, and success handling.
frontend/src/hooks/ClientSessionProvider: Context provider managing client session tokens in localStorage with auth helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing backend actors tied to Internet Identity with reactive refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Hooks for checking admin bootstrap status and running the initial admin bootstrap mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens, validates them with the actor service, and exposes login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSession.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context and helpers for login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin bootstrap, client management, and shipment retrieval using actor APIs and session tokens.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and custom theme variables, including DFC branding colors and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable invoice PDF by opening a styled HTML document in a new window and invoking print.
frontend/src/lib/shipmentsStorage.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Creates WhatsApp deep links for payment reminders and support messages using predefined templates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps backend client-auth error messages to user-friendly strings with specific handling for common cases.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or 10‑digit mobile identifiers and returns structured validation results with error messages.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smooth-scrolls to a DOM element by id with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for implementing client login history storage and admin‑side retrieval.
